title: Evia wildfires sweep Greek island as UN releases damning climate change report
content:
1. Evia wildfires sweep Greek island as UN releases damning climate change report  The Washington Post
  2. Photos show devastating wildfires in Greece  CNBC
  3. Greece wildfires: Evia island residents forced to evacuate  BBC News
  4. Greek President And Prime Minister Thank Countries Helping Greece In Firefighting Efforts  GreekCityTimes.com
  5. “Like a horror movie”: Greece wildfires continue to force thousands of evacuations  Global News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 国連が気候変動に関する報告書を発表する中、ギリシャのエビア島で山火事が発生
联合国发布严厉的气候变化报告，埃维亚野火席卷希腊岛屿
聯合國發佈嚴厲的氣候變化報告，埃維亞野火席捲希臘島嶼
